ygData.msgSnippet: Your body rejected the transfer. Veratis said looking up at the large bear. You ll probably lose those wings in time he didn t want to tell her but knew it

"Your body rejected the transfer." Veratis said looking up at the 
large bear. "You'll probably lose those wings in time" he didn't want 
to tell her but knew it was best to be honest with a bot with 
telepathic abilities. "I had to use the virus to stop the rejection. 
You might lose your ability to transform completely." he kept his 
distance, he didn't know how she'd react to the bad news.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Shadow Wing::
> 
> She stood on wabbly legs for a bit.  She looked around as her 
vision 
> started clear up. She looked at Veratis. She stood there, with a 
full 
> polarbear body, large white wings growing out of her shoulders.  
She 
> tried to get her diognasotic systems to work, and she couldn't find 
> most of her old computer systems.  "What happened?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Veratis scanned Shadow Wings new form, her spark seemed in 
control 
> > regaurdless of what her form appeared to be. "I'll let you out 
now, 
> > just be ready for some disorientation. your form might not be 
> > adjusted yet." the door to the CR chamber slid open to reveal an 
> > extremely large female polar bear. Veratis looked on startled, it 
> was 
> > no wonder she fealt cramped, instead of the proportions of a 
> > halfbreed polar bear/ owl, she was now the size of a full grown 
> polar 
> > bear. "My dear, I don't think Shadow Wing is appropriate 
anymore." 
> > His mind went blank, he didn't know what to make of her new form 
> all 
> > he could see is what could now be possible.
> >
